channel.title: If you could have Portal Gun, what would you do with it?
channel.description:
So, lets think with portals.
Since it is possible to create infinite fall mechanism by placing two portals one over another it would be possible to successfully build perpetuum mobile device, thus achieve infinite source of free energy. I would use that to assume leadership position as worldwide energy supplier by delivering it for free, which would establish absolute governments and companies dependence from me. Having that I would order to stop all wars and conflicts, and become everyones dear king of the world. :slight_smile: But first, I would have some fun with it. :wink:
And you?

item.title: If you could have Portal Gun, what would you do with it?
item.dc:creator: Shamizzle
item.description:
I would touch my right elbow with my right hand. Try it right now and see what I mean.

Read full topic
item.source: If you could have Portal Gun, what would you do with it?

item.title: If you could have Portal Gun, what would you do with it?
item.dc:creator: zap12341
item.description:
Piefish:

If I had a Portal Gun I’d submerge it in liquid…partially…just to see what happens

Give them a choice to do that ^^ or to look at the operational end of the device

Read full topic
item.source: If you could have Portal Gun, what would you do with it?

item.title: If you could have Portal Gun, what would you do with it?
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
Medkit:

I would shoot one portal into the ocean and another one onto the moon.
-That would solve the problem of sea level rise, and also I’d like to see a blue moon.

Wouldn’t all the water evaporate because there’s no air on the moon? And if you drain too much, there will be SEVERE DROUGHTS EVERYWHERE, not to mention enormous tidal waves and the world’s largest (and most deadly) whirlpool. :fffuuu: Not a good idea.

Read full topic
item.source: If you could have Portal Gun, what would you do with it?

get ritch

are you trying to misspell as many words as possible?

item.title: If you could have Portal Gun, what would you do with it?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I think he meant that he would put a portal on these landmarks, then another on the ground far away and then just lay on the ground and graffiti the hell out of the landmarks.

If I had a Portal Gun, however, I’d think bigger than lame-ass graffiti.

Read full topic

item.title: If you could have Portal Gun, what would you do with it?
item.dc:creator: BrAndi
item.description:
1. Why do you want to flood Toronto???!!!

  2. Are you certain you know how portals work?
    It’s not some sort of face-cannon, or smily-cannon…

item.source: If you could have Portal Gun, what would you do with it?

item.title: If you could have Portal Gun, what would you do with it?
item.dc:creator: SlashBolt
item.description:
I would create an orange portal to Toronto, Canada, and go on a deep sea adventure to the bottom of the Pacific Ocean and create a blue one, then once I’ve demonstrated my power, then I’ll finally be able to paint my face on Big Ben, The Queen, Australia, and the moon! Then, I’ll run away with the Companion Cube, and fulfill an inanimate romance!

Read full topic

I would give it to a mentally handicapped child just to see what would happen

Tried that. They looked at the operational end of the device. The results weren’t pretty.

DrasarSalman:

I’d both look into and touch the operational part of it!

teehee

item.title: If you could have Portal Gun, what would you do with it?
item.dc:creator: Smidgens
item.description:
I have been pondering this matter thoroughly for some time now.
I’ve come to the conclusion that the only right thing to do with a Portal gun would be to shave my back…and maybe my ass.
Once this is dealt with then maybe we can tend to minor matters such as infinite energy production.

Read full topic
item.source: If you could have Portal Gun, what would you do with it?
